description.value:
Wondrous item, varies (requires attunement)
While wearing this bear head-shaped belt buckle, you can use an action to cast @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.izAYjuiXEYPJat3R]{polymorph} on yourself, transforming into a type of bear determined by the type of belt buckle you are wearing. While you are in the form of a bear, you retain your Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores. In addition, you don’t need to maintain concentration on the spell, and the transformation lasts for 1 hour, until you use a bonus action to revert to your normal form, or until you drop to 0 hit points or die. The belt buckle can’t be used this way again until the next dawn.
Black Honey Buckle (Uncommon). When you use this belt buckle to cast @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.izAYjuiXEYPJat3R]{polymorph} on yourself, you transform into a @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.npcs.Actor.BLi3PwiKwa4TVWVB]{black bear}.
Brown Honey Buckle (Rare). When you use this belt buckle to cast @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.izAYjuiXEYPJat3R]{polymorph} on yourself, you transform into a @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.npcs.Actor.2Uyw9ZrqRJur5bwE]{brown bear.}
White Honey Buckle (Very Rare). When you use this belt buckle to cast @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.spells.Item.izAYjuiXEYPJat3R]{polymorph} on yourself, you transform into a @UUID[Compendium.black-flag.npcs.Actor.JHttBWIKfW7bFVtr]{polar bear}.
